department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en:
"Computer vision is the enterprise of automating and integrating a wide range of processes and representations for visual perception [Ballard and Brown 1982]. In this course, we plan to address the theoretic foundations and technical aspects of computer vision. It will cover branches of many different disciplines and has applications across the whole spectrum of science, art and humanities.
The following issues will be introduced in this course.
?Applications of computer vision
?History of computer vision
?2D Shape description and representation
?2D representation
?Stereo vision
?Feature extraction
?Feature matching
?Motion analysis
?Range finder
?Region analysis
?Texture analysis
?Color analysis
?3D shape description and representation"
